comments.comment:
So... the same thing 
Nagananda says.  Why don't  both of you join together and talk to the people.  Still the people are frightened of JVP activities in early days.  Though they tell,  this time must vote to you.  But at once they say oh... still remember the darkness of that period.   So until they have the fear of the earlier days it is difficult for you to win  people's heart.  Dear Anura..  We like the way you talk to us.  This is the only chance for you and us to rescue our Motherland.  Please do not allow to come these wicked, selfish, cruel, corrupted and  cunning creatures.  Think of our country,  especially  our poor childrens' future.   Grab the  Vikalpa parties (many people say Nagananda really wants to do the justice to our country).  Think twice and talk with Nagananda and please take a decision.  Without thinking of personal privileges come forward and take a bold decision.  If you really love our Motherland and the people's of Sri Lanka you will definitely change your mind.  Please hurry up still there is time.  Your name will be written in our history with golden letters.  Hope you will be able to read my humble request.  Thank you. Theruwan Saranai!  A mother of two children.
comments.author: Mallika Buddhadasa
